channel.title: Release-notes on Plus-F
channel.description: Recent content in Release-notes on Plus-F

item.title: Version 0.6
item.description:
• Implemented TAP and TZX support
  • Added support for +2
  • Fixed some processor emulation bugs (there are still others in there)

item.title: Version 0.5
item.description:
• Initial public release
  • Emulation is still rather buggy (I will add fixes, but for the moment consider it the equivalent of a wobbly RAM pack or tape loading errors!)
    • Reset doesn’t always work properly
    • Some snapshots fail to load if the Emulator has been running for some time
